mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.request_date, f.sede_inps, f.control_date, f.sikness_from, f.sikness_to, f.result_comunication_type, f.result, f.note, f.id_user FROM fiscalcontrol f where f.id_user = #{id_user};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fiscalcontrol (request_date, sede_inps, control_date, sikness_from, sikness_to, result_comunication_type, result, note, id_user) VALUES (#{request_date}, #{sede_inps}, #{control_date}, #{sikness_from}, #{sikness_to}, #{result_comunication_type}, #{result}, #{note}, #{id_user});
